# NeuralFlow

Deep learning framework built with numpy (cupy)  
This version supports cuda 11.x ver

## install
```shell
git clone https://github.com/augustinLib/neuralflow.git
```
or
```
pip install neuralflow
```


## Structure

- neuralflow
    - \_\_init\_\_.py
    - data.py
    - function.py
    - function_class.py
    - model.py
    - optimizer.py
    - trainer.py
    - utils.py
    - nlp
      - utils.py
    - epoch_notice
